page.title: 11Armed forces/ rural Sowerby
page.content: {Allanbrookes Barracks} Situated at the north western corner of the block there is an air-field where the Royal Air Force is based. At present it is used by the Royal Naval Elementary Flying School jointly run by the Royal Air Force and Senior Naval Officers. The Naval staff come in daily from other camps. There are 12 training planes and some helicopters. At weekends there is a parachute club called the Merlin Parachute club consisting of joint military and civil parachutes. Old ammunition bunkers are used as stables at which there is a riding school. There are 23 horses in daily use - 10 are privately owned and 13 are military owned. There are 7 military staff working at the stables.
